content: this is a summary of a civil case heard in the šiauliai district court the court has made a final decision regarding the division of property in a divorce case the applicant will be awarded a vehicle but is required to compensate the defendant with half of its value the text discusses various aspects of the case including the statutory matrimonial property regime fulfillment of obligations by the spouses and the concept of shareable property the court has also addressed issues related to the childs place of residence access arrangements and maintenance the marriage has been dissolved and the court has ordered the defendant to pay maintenance for the minor daughter the court has divided the property addressed debts and awarded costs to both parties the defendant has been ordered to pay the applicant for nonmaterial damage additionally a vehicle owned by the defendant has been declared as personal property and the applicant is required to pay half of its value various costs and fees have been assigned to both parties
